coded_answer.p: Thank you a lotvery much for your kind letter. I was very surprised onat the result of the competition. Now I am happy to give you all the information you need.
I think it would be better for me to travel onin July. I will startedstart an Italian course in August, so it will be impossible for me to leave then.

In your letter you ask me to choose beetweenbetween tents or log cabins, well. Well I prefer to stay in a log cabin. It is more confortablecomfortable and I am afraid aboutof wild animals. I saw, you offer a lot of activities, that'is. That's fantastic! It is very difficult to decide which two of these activities I like most and I can also do the best. I think I choosewill choose singing because I have sung for five years in a church choruschoir and I do it very well. The other activity I like very muchemuch is swimming. I tookhave taken part atin a lot of competitions.

Now I would like to ask you if weewe need some money and if it is necessary to take with me special clothes. I hope I have givegiven to you all the information you neededneed and I am looking forward to hearing from you.
I am happy to tell you about the experience I madehad at the pop concert last month.

I had to start very early in the morning, at 7.30. We firstFirst we had to prapareprepare the stands with food and drinksdrink and buy something which had been forgotten. Then we had to put onturn on the night lights and decorate the whole room.

In the afternoon the singers camescame in and I also could have an interview with Ricky Martin. I was very excited! He is very beatifulbeautiful! At the end of the interview he invitesinvited me to have dinner with him after the concert. I logicallynaturally accepted. The interview I liked particularlyI particularly liked the interview. Before the concert started, we had to verify check all the musicmusical instruments. The microphones all had to be controlledchecked. FortunatlyFortunately we had no problem. The concert was a success. I was very proudeproud of memyself and the work I had done. After the concert I left with Ricky Martin. We went to a nice restaurant and enjoyed dinner together.
I am sure, my dear Kim, I will never forget that wonderful experience.
Now I hope you will answer soon and tell me a bit ofabout your adventure or experience you had in last time.
